Recipe.Description:
Whipping air into butter keeps it spreadable even when chilled.
You can also add aromatic herbs to make a compound butter.

Method.Step: Place butter in mixer and run at slow speed until butter consolidates into a mass.
Turn up speed and continue to whip until it's light and fluffy -about 5 minutes
Put in plastic containers or turn onto sheets of waxed paper or plastic wrap, roll up and refrigerate until you can shape into sticks again.

Variations.Variation: While the butter is in the mixer, add 3-4 tblsps extra-virgin olive oil (break out the good stuff) and your favorite selection of chopped herbs (chives, parsley, sage, rosemary and thyme).
